Constructor Detail

GAIGSRefStruct

public GAIGSRefStruct(RefBox[] refboxes)
Create a RefStruct containing the given RefBoxes with the default bounds and font size.

Parameters:
refboxes - The array containing all of the RefBoxes that comprise this RefStruct.

GAIGSRefStruct

public GAIGSRefStruct(RefBox[] refboxes,
                      double x1,
                      double y1,
                      double x2,
                      double y2,
                      double fontSize)
Create a RefStruct with the given Refboxes and he given bounds and font size.

Parameters:
refboxes - The array containing all of the RefBoxes that comprise the RefStruct.
x1 - The lower x bound of the visualization.
y1 - The lower y bound of the visualization.
x2 - The upper x bound of the visualization.
y2 - The upper y bound of the visualization.
fontSize - The font size of the visualization title.
